# MONITORINFOEX Equality operator

Implement the equality operator (==).

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(MONITORINFOEX operator1, MONITORINFOEX operator2)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| operator1 | Operating 1. |
| operator2 | Operating 2. |

## Return Value

Returns true if `operator1` is equal to `operator2`; false otherwise.
